net.proteusframework.core.metric

Class PercentMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric
      • net.proteusframework.core.metric.PercentMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public final class PercentMetric
extends Metric
    A PercentMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a percentage. The value is relative to some other undefined Metric. For example, a component with a width PercentMetric of 50% would be relative to the width of its parent component. Valid values for this metric are [0,100] (inclusive).
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
